name: Hero Survival Jungle
description:
Hero Survival Jungle Escape is adventure action packed game where you craft your own fate in a huge open world island & jungle environment. You are only one person is survived after a terrible crash in deep-sea! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the sea. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of wreckage passing by that made you realize that you are the only hero survival of ship crash. Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive in jungle escape. Resolve the secret of the Island gather everything & use everything you find to survive. Discover this mysterious world. Survival here will be no simple task. Play this Hero Survival Jungle Escape mission and get ready to find tools and resources that would help you in crafting big raft to hero escape the sea. Island survival hero finds a cave for your stay swim through the streams find ropes build fences hunt down animals for food build shelter make firefight and kill the animals that may attack you build a raft out of woods and ropes and escape the island by making a super hit hero escape story. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of animals in the forest rescue passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash in Hero Survival Jungle Escape game.
Experience the full day & night cycle and face the dangers of darkness and cold. First, you’ll need to find food hunt down rabbits. Survival on this wilderness is a tough challenge where you need to gather different resources likes woods stone ax and ropes and make your stay on the tropical jungle safe and sound. Wild animals are roaming freely in the rainforest and are in hunt of prey be cautious and defend yourself from the wilderness and other dangers. An extreme jungle adventure is waiting for you where you need to implement all possible and survival skills to successfully survival escape. In a rough situation, you will be confronted with many problems that you need to stun​. Stay alert and aim your target as quickly as possible. You found yourself all alone in the jungle run wandering the fear. Your adventure is about to begin. The angry and hungry crocodile is always near you so you got to be careful attack & kill the crocodile with a knife. Gather resources from the harsh world to stay alive and expand your escape safely to create more place to live in! Clear all missions and make yourself survive in jungle and escape. Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive. Can you survive in this most strategic and epic Hero Survival Jungle Escape 2018 game?

Key Features:
- Interesting Game Play
- Smooth and intuitive controls
- Stunning & High-Quality 3D Graphics
- Thrilling and challenging Missions
- Amazing 3D Sea, Jungle & Island Environment
- Underwater Shipwreck to Explore Island Survival
- Gathering stones, wood, rope, food and many more
- Tree Cutting with ax and making raft for survival
